/*   Anurag Anand  */

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int nCase;
    scanf("%d",&nCase);
    while(nCase--)
    {
       int num;
       scanf("%d",&num);
       int sqroot=(int)sqrt(num*1.0);
       printf("%d\n",sqroot);
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
